main event: A huge ball of fire was sighted multiple times over Nunivak Island, Alaska on 16 October 1950.
interesting points: The ball of fire was deep red in color,The sighting occurred three times in approximately five minutes,The objects were observed moving at high speeds and at varying altitudes,Several observers confirmed the sighting,No photographs or physical evidence were captured.
witness description: Several observers, including a CAA airway communications station operator and military personnel.
